title: Goran Đukić
text:
Goran Đukić or Djukić (; born 6 November 1970) is a <a href="Bosnian%20Serb">Bosnian Serb</a> retired <a href="association%20football">football</a>er.
Born in <a href="Banja%20Luka">Banja Luka</a>, <a href="SR%20Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">SR Bosnia and Herzegovina</a>, during his career he played for <a href="FK%20Borac%20Banja%20Luka">FK Borac Banja Luka</a>, <a href="FK%20Hajduk%20Kula">FK Hajduk Kula</a>, <a href="FK%20Milicionar">FK Milicionar</a> and <a href="Red%20Star%20Belgrade">Red Star Belgrade</a> in the <a href="First%20League%20of%20FR%20Yugoslavia">First League of FR Yugoslavia</a>, and also with Austrian club SV Wörgl.
